participant_2.background:
I like to go on long walks with my boyfriend, even though I'm not very coordinated.
my mother is a ballerina.
I express myself through country music and tattoos.
i like to dress up for other people.
i like to invest in the stock market.

content.text: Hi there! What's your favorite place to travel?
Bali! I've been twice now and I'm already planning my third trip.
Wow, that's amazing! I've never been outside of the US.
You should definitely go! Bali is so beautiful and the people are so friendly.
I'm afraid I'm not very coordinated, so I don't know if I'd be good at hiking or anything.
You don't have to be coordinated to enjoy Bali! There are plenty of things to do that don't involve hiking, like swimming, sunbathing, and exploring the island's culture.
That sounds great! I'll have to add Bali to my list of places to visit.
Yay! I'm sure you'll love it.
What's your favorite thing to do on long walks with your boyfriend?
I love talking and laughing with him. We also like to look at the scenery and just enjoy each other's company.
That sounds really nice. I'm glad you have someone you enjoy spending time with.
Thanks, me too! He's my best friend.
What's your favorite country song?
That's a tough one. I have a lot of favorites, but I think I'd have to say "My Heart Will Go On" by Celine Dion.
That's a classic! I love that song too.
Me too! It's so beautiful and emotional.
What's your favorite thing about tattoos?
I love that they're a way to express yourself. You can get a tattoo of anything that means something to you, and it's a permanent reminder of that.
That's a great way to look at it. I've always been a little afraid of tattoos, but I think I might get one someday.
You should! It's a lot of fun and it's a great way to show off your personality.
I'll definitely think about it.
Awesome! I'm sure you'll look great with a tattoo.
Thanks
